QuestData.Title: Frostbite: Causes and Symptoms
QuestData.Description: Elements live in the totems, $r. Release them and break the ice. Free your tuskarr friends!
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the totems to release the trapped tuskarr hunters in the Azure Span.
QuestData.RewardText: You did WHAT!? Bah... doesn't matter for now. This isn't over just yet.
